articles.title: 'Melted, charred metal': Russian rockets hit Ukrainian rail supply routes
articles.description: Russian missiles hit Ukrainian rail infrastructure in five places. Ukraine's military command claims the attacks aim to disrupt arms shipments from the nation's allies. CNN's Scott McLean reports.
articles.content: Russian missiles hit Ukrainian rail infrastructure in five places. Ukraines military command claims the attacks aim to disrupt arms shipments from the nations allies. CNNs Scott McLean reports.
